name: Prime Ribeye Steak
description: Premium aged ribeye steak grilled to perfection, topped with garlic herb butter and served with roasted baby potatoes.

name: Lobster
description: Atlantic lobster roasted in a creamy brandy and mushroom sauce, topped with gratinéed cheese.

name: Tagliatelle
description: Fresh handmade pasta tossed in truffle cream and shaved parmesan.

name: Seared Chilean Sea Bass
description: Pan-seared sea bass with lemon beurre blanc and roasted vegetables.

name: Duck à l’Orange
description: Crispy duck breast with a caramelized orange glaze, served with confit potatoes.

name: Dark Chocolate Soufflé
description: Warm, fluffy soufflé with molten center and vanilla bean ice cream.

name: Burrata & Heirloom Tomatoes
description: Creamy burrata with heirloom tomatoes, basil oil, and a drizzle of aged balsamic.

name: Seared Scallops
description: Pan-seared scallops served with pea purée and crispy pancetta.

name: Truffle Parmesan Fries
description: Crispy golden fries tossed in truffle oil and topped with grated parmesan.

name: Grilled Asparagus with Hollandaise
description: Fresh asparagus spears grilled and served with a silky hollandaise sauce.

name: Classic Tiramisu
description: Espresso-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream and dusted with cocoa.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: Vanilla bean custard topped with a caramelized sugar crust.

name: Espresso Martini
description: A luxurious blend of vodka, coffee liqueur, and espresso — smooth and bold.

name: Elderflower Spritz
description: A light and floral mix of elderflower liqueur, prosecco, and soda over ice.

name: Passion Fruit Mocktail
description: Refreshing blend of passion fruit, lime juice, and sparkling soda.
